query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM Category c WHERE c.parent IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(ds) FROM DataSet ds WHERE ds.category IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Simulation s WHERE s.category IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(sim) FROM Simulation sim WHERE sim.completedSamples < sim.totalSamples OR sim.stale = true
SELECT OBJECT(sim) FROM Simulation sim WHERE sim.completedSamples < sim.totalSamples
SELECT OBJECT(sim) FROM Simulation sim WHERE sim.stale = true
